类 Metrics

java.lang.Object
comp3111.popnames.metrics.Metrics
直接已知子类:
AgeMetrics, EducationalMetrics, IncomeMetrics, KidsMetrics, MeaningMetrics, ThemeMetrics
public abstract class Metrics
extends java.lang.Object
This interface provides detailed scores and related descriptions
